data.text:
OBITUARIES

Local Obituaries for Luzerne County, PA. & Wyoming County, PA.

About

Metcalfe Shaver Kopcza Funeral Home, Inc. is a collection of obituaries for Luzerne County, PA. & Wyoming County, PA. With services throughout Pennsylvania that are updated regularly. Find local obituaries and join us in celebrating memories and honoring their lives and legacies.
